name: Dharma Doujou
overview: Dharma Dōjō is a puzzle game starring a monk (player 1) and a shrine maiden (player 2) who must knock away all the blocks to clear the stage. The time limit, rather than being represented by a traditional clock, is a demon, located on the left of the screen, climbing up a rope and must be stopped before it reaches the ceiling and releases a large temple bell onto the player's blocks.
